column5: Well i broke down after 13 months of grieving my best friend of thirteen years. My Shaina was an American Pitbull and was my best friend and she will never be forgotten.. The house has never felt so empty so i broke down and bought a new Pup, a boxer this time as to the fact of the Pitbull ban i thought the choice was fitting. The family has takin a real liking to Shimano LOL Sure he will fit in just fine and i cant wait to get him in the boat. After seeing Spiel with his Pup in September it brought back alot of memories for me which got me thinking it was time . Here are a couple pics of the new family member.. The first one is Shaina!
Very cute pup and kids Mike!!!
cute pup dude! congrats on the new fishin' buddy!  cheers, UF
Congrats bassmastermike He's a real cutie
Great family Mike and none of them have your eyes ! At least not the last time I saw you anyhow....hemorrhaging from Dawg's houch!
She's beautiful Mike, congrats. Looks like the kids have fallen in love already too!
Now that's the cutest boxer I have ever seen and looks like the perfect addition Mike may you have many happy years together!

Great dogs!!! Great looking pup! they truly are little clowns at that age, also make great fishing buddy's!!! mines 3 and still nuts!!! keeps the big one busy though. TRYING TO HELP OUT  BIG GUY!!  RARE QUITE MOMENT
What a gorgeous puppy Mike.  I'm sure you'll have many memorable years with Shimano  What sweet girls too.  I bet they're thrilled.  Joey
Cute pup and great looking kids buddy!
Sorry about the loss of your long time buddy.  You're new pup is a cutie.  Great looking family !!!  Great name too....Shimano !!!
Great pics Mike!!!  Very cute kids and pup!!!
Thanks to all that replied! Shimano is adjusting well and the kids love him. Hey Wayne im surprised you could actually see my eyes after the shine . That stuff came close to making me blind LOL
